title: Document Upload
subtitle: Upload your business documents for automatic processing

upload.dropzone: Drop files here or click to browse
upload.accepted: PDF, JPG, PNG files up to 10MB

confidence.title: OCR Confidence
confidence.description: Confidence level indicates how certain the OCR system is about the extracted data

extraction.title: Extracted Information
extraction.subtitle: Please review and correct the extracted data if needed
extraction.noDataExtracted: No structured data could be extracted from this document

validation.fileRequired: Please upload at least one document
validation.fileSize: File size must be less than 10MB
validation.fileType: Only PDF, JPG, and PNG files are supported
validation.ocrFailed: OCR processing failed. Please try again or enter data manually
validation.lowConfidence: Low confidence in extracted data. Please review carefully
validation.invalidIban: Extracted IBAN appears to be invalid
validation.invalidCui: Extracted CUI appears to be invalid

errors.rateLimitExceeded: Too many uploads. Please wait a moment.
